His research focuses on deployable robot systems and learning in the unstructured open world. His representative work includes Mobile Aloha, Robot Parkour Learning, and RMA. Mobile Aloha is a humanoid robot that can be remote operated by a user and perform autonomously by imitation learning.

name: Jose Sotelo
description: Jose Sotelo is a Senior AI Researcher at Descript, a company that specializes in AI-powered audio and video editing tools. He has extensive experience in natural language processing, machine learning, and AI research. At Descript, Sotelo leads the development of cutting-edge AI technologies to enhance audio and video editing capabilities, making the process more efficient and user-friendly.

name: Lindsey Spellman
description: Lindsey Spellman is the head of marketing of Abridge, a company founded in 2018 with the mission of powering deeper understanding in healthcare through AI-powered technology. Abridge's platform transforms medical conversations into structured clinical notes in real-time, with deep EMR integrations. As pioneers in generative AI for healthcare, Abridge is setting industry standards for responsible AI deployment across health systems.

name: Xuhui Shao
description: Dr. Xuhui Shao is the Managing Partner of Foothill Ventures, a technology-focused venture fund investing in early stage startups in the US. Before that Xuhui has been Yahoo's Vice President II Engineering in charge of Yahoo’s global display ads platforms; Founding technologist of Ad Tech pioneer company Turn and AI risk management company ID Analytics.  Xuhui earned his BS and MS degrees from Tsinghua University, and his Ph.D. in EECS from University of Minnesota. Xuhui is an early investor of Plus.AI, Weride.AI and Certik - all subsequent unicorn companies.

name: Jai Natarajan
description: Natalia is VP and Field CTO, ML at Cerebras Systems. She has decades of R&D experience in NLP, CV, ML and IR. Prior to Cerebras, Natalia was a Sr. Research Manager at Hewlett Packard Labs, where she led the Software and AI group in 2015-2019 and served as the head of HP Labs Russia in 2011-2015. She led research teams developing algorithms and applications for text, image and time series analysis and modelling. In 2012-2015 Natalia also was a part-time Associate Professor at St. Petersburg State University and a part-time lecturer at Computer Science Center, St. Petersburg, Russia. She holds a PhD in CS from St. Petersburg State University.

name: Minfa Wang
description: Minfa Wang is the CTO of 1Gen Labs. He was a Senior Machine Learning Engineer at Waymo, where he leverages advanced ML techniques to enhance autonomous driving technologies. With a deep focus on innovation and safety, Minfa plays a crucial role in developing 1Gen Agent systems that improves the community engagement.

name: ankit jain
description: ankit jain is a seasoned entrepreneur and technology leader. he is the co-founder and ceo of infinitus systems, an ai-powered healthcare automation company. prior to infinitus, ankit was a founding partner at gradient ventures, google's ai-focused venture fund, and a director of engineering at google. he has also co-founded and led other successful startups like quettra, which was acquired by similarweb, and cuil, which was acquired by google. ankit has extensive experience in areas such as search, mobile analytics, and artificial intelligence.

name: Shyam Rajagopalan
description: Shyam Rajagopalan is the Co-Founder and CTO of Infinitus Systems, Inc., a technology company based in the United States. He holds a degree from the prestigious UC Berkeley College of Engineering. As the CTO, Shyam is responsible for driving the technical vision and strategy for Infinitus. With over 500 connections on LinkedIn, he is well-connected in the industry and leverages his expertise to lead the company's technological innovations.

name: Jason Ge
description: Jason Ge is a Media ML Infra Engineer at Netflix, where he plays a pivotal role in building and scaling the company's media machine learning infrastructure. With expertise in machine learning and a deep understanding of Netflix's content ecosystem, he contributes to innovative solutions that enhance the media experience for millions of subscribers worldwide. Ge's work focuses on developing scalable platforms, leveraging cutting-edge technologies, and enabling seamless integration of machine learning algorithms into Netflix's applications and services.

name: VS Joshi
job: Global Head Of Product and Solutions Marketing
description: VS Joshi is the Global Head of Product and Solutions Marketing at Digitate, a leading AI and machine learning company. With extensive experience in product marketing at Fortune 500 companies and startups, he excels in crafting compelling product positioning, messaging, and go-to-market strategies. Joshi is skilled in leading cross-functional teams, creating sales enablement programs, and executing creative demand generation campaigns. He is a sought-after speaker on AI and machine learning topics, known for his ability to evangelize new solutions and thrive in undefined spaces.

name: Nathan Lile
description: Nathan Lile is the Co-Founder and CEO of SynthLabs.AI, a startup focused on developing transparent and auditable AI alignment platforms. Prior to SynthLabs, Nathan served as the Chief of Staff at Stability AI, where he led enterprise projects and partnerships. He was also a top-ranked professional swimmer, competing twice in the Olympic Trials, and was the valedictorian of his university.

name: Tiffany Joy Basse
description: Tiffany innovates with generative AI through Liferise, an app channeling indigenous elder wisdom into modern tech. It features AI coaching, tailored meditations, spirit animal stories, Earth Wisdom Cards, and sound healing, aimed at personal growth and cultural connection.

name: Siqi Lin
description: Siqi Lin is the Head of Campaign at Cresta, a Stanford-based AI company. She is a Stanford Fellowship recipient and has expertise in strategic marketing campaigns. Lin's professional experience spans across various roles, showcasing her versatility and leadership skills in driving impactful initiatives.

name: Vivi Lin
description: Vivi Lin is a Columnist for FT China, focusing on innovation, in particular AI and Web3. As a passionate advocate for AI for good and responsible AI, Vivi has a rich background as a bilingual presenter and producer for Reuters TV and CCTV. Currently, she serves as a partner and consultant for various Web3 and AI startups, leveraging her expertise to drive forward the future of technology and humanity.

name: Jiajun Lu
description: Jiajun Lu is a global leader in artificial intelligence and computer vision with over a decade of experience. He has led teams and startups to deliver successful products, published the book "Enhanced Human," and won awards like Top 10 Pioneering CEOs and Top 50 CEOs of AI companies. Currently, Lu is building Akool, a company focused on personalized visual marketing using generative AI for videos, images, and avatars.

name: Sakshi Pratap
description: Sakshi Pratap is the Co-Founder and CEO of Hexus, a startup specializing in AI-powered personalized product demos and guides. She has extensive experience leading tech teams at companies like Google and early-stage startups. Sakshi holds a Master's degree in Computer Science from Georgia Tech and is passionate about leveraging AI to drive innovation and enhance user experiences.

name: Claire Xie
description: Claire Xie is the founder of ClinkAI, an AI startup, and the Women in AI Club, which aims to connect, empower, and elevate founders, builders, and investors in the AI space. Previously, she worked as a lead data scientist at DoorDash and Google, focusing on growth analytics. Xie is passionate about leveraging AI to drive innovation and empowering women in the tech industry.

name: Heping Liu
description: Heping Liu is a Senior Principal Machine Learning Engineer at Workday, where he has led the development of forecasting and optimization products using ML. He spearheaded the design of next-gen platform architecture, disaster recovery strategies, and open-source software management. Previously, he co-founded and served as CEO of Beijing Unigroup AI Technologies Inc. Liu holds a Ph.D. and has authored around 20 papers in top journals. His research interests include forecasting, optimization, AI/ML algorithms, LLM, big data, and analytics.

name: Kathryn Wu
description: Kathryn co-founded Openmart, a Y Combinator-backed AI tool challenging ZoomInfo, analyzing unstructured data like websites for sales professionals. Previously at Pinterest and first product lead at Databento, she grew its team and revenue significantly, earning a spot on the 2022 Women in Fintech Power List. Openmart is also supported by Afore Capital and Rebel Fund among others.
